name: M.U.G.E.N
content:
custom-name: Capcom VS SNK Evolution (Rev 2)
files:
- file_id:
    filename: CvSEVO.rar
    referer: https://lutris.net
    url: https://download1199.mediafire.com/j4h23vqj2esg/163qwroaqmd3k8a/CAPCOM+VS+SNK+EVOLUTION+REV+2.rar
game:
  arch: win64
  exe: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Games/CAPCOM VS SNK EVOLUTION - REV 2/CVSEVOREV2.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win64
    install_gecko: false
    install_mono: false
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Games/
    file: file_id
    format: rar
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Games/CAPCOM VS SNK EVOLUTION - REV 2/
    file: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Games/ADDONS AND FIXES/ANTIALIASING FILTER/CVSEVOREV2 Anti-Aliasing
      Filter.rar
    format: rar
- execute:
    command: sed -i "s/FullScreen = 0/FullScreen = 1/g" "$GAMEDIR/drive_c/Games/CAPCOM
      VS SNK EVOLUTION - REV 2/data/mugen.cfg"
